text: Andrés Fernandez de Ipenza (died 1643) was a Roman Catholic prelate who served as Bishop-Elect of Yucatán (1643)."Father Andrés Fernandez de Ipenza" Catholic-Hierarchy.org. David M. Cheney. Retrieved August 27, 2016 ==Biography== On 9 Feb 1643, he was selected by the King of Spain and confirmed by Pope Urban VIII on 5 Oct 1643 as Bishop of Yucatán. He died on 24 Oct 1643 before he was installed to the bishopric. == References == ==External links and additional sources== * (for Chronology of Bishops) * (for Chronology of Bishops) Category:17th-century Roman Catholic bishops Category:Bishops appointed by Pope Urban VIII Category:1643 deaths
title: Andrés Fernandez de Ipenza
